ygData.subject: Bard Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: This is not so much a suggestion as a comparison to what I wear. ... SSB ... Same ... Same... well, Mask of Deception ... Collar of Undead Protection ...
ygData.messageBody:
This is not so much a suggestion as a comparison to what I wear.

>In light of the new stats information, I need some help.
>
>Here's what I got:
>
>Head - BI Crown/Froglok Crown (mostly the BI, I need the str)
SSB

>Ears - Opalline Earrings (considering some +4 str, +2 int)
Same

>Face - Mask of the Deceiver
Same... well, Mask of Deception

>Neck - Gold Black Pearl Choker
Collar of Undead Protection

>Cloak - White Wolfhide Cloak (considering an Icebear cloak)
Lizardscale Cloak

>Shoulders - Bloodstained Mantle
Crested Spaulders

>Chest - Black Enamelled Chestplate
Lambent (I should move on your breastplate.)

>Arms - Lambent
Same

>Bracers - Both Lambent (I'm a wood elf, can't wear a hero bracer)
Same... same reason.

>Gloves - Lambent
Same

>Rings - +7 cha/+5 dex rings
I used to wear these, but now just carry them for when I am charming.
My normal ring is a pair of Jagged Bands.

>Belt - Trollhide belt
Same... should probably replace with a Thick Leather Apron (or a
Thick Banded Belt if I could score one.)

>Pants - Lambent
Same

>Boots - Lambent
Same

>Ranged - Runed Bone Fork
Same

>Weapons - 1 Ykesha, Black Enamelled Mace, Ashenwood Shortspear
MM drum... *Smiles* Ok, sometimes I use my Staff of Writhing, EBM,
Silvery 1H, or Obsid Shard.

>
>This combo gives me 104 str, 80 sta, 107 agi, 120 dex, 80 wis, 75
>int, 126 cha (if I remember correctly) and approximately 700
>AC...I need more str and more agi and would rather not lose very
>much cha or AC. So, I'm looking for suggestions. The only items
>that are not available to me in some fashion are planes items.
I think I am at:
104 STR
81 STA
100 AGL
105 DEX
80 WIS
75 INT
120 CHA

BUT... I have about 765AC (when I am Cleric buffed, I usually fight
in the 812-825 range depending on song selection.)

>
>Robynn Merrilin, level 40 wood elf bard, E'ci
Gaelthorne, Level 41 Wood Elf Bard, Xegony
